title: Lawn Mowing
description: A quick, professional cut and edge to give your yard that manicured look.  Let us help you create and maintain the best looking yard on the block.

title: Pet Waste Cleanup
description: If you're tired of stepping in your pets' waste in your yard or of the brown spots it causes, let us know and we'll scoop it up for you!

title: Hedge Trimming
description: Got a few overgrown hedges or ornamental trees that could use a trim?  Just need some regular maintenance to keep them pretty and healthy?  Weâ€™ve got you covered.

title: Mulch Application
description: If you need some mulch placed to help control weeds, retain moisture, and regulate soil temperature for your plants, look no further.

title: Leaf Cleanup
description: We mulch or collect and remove leaves from your lawn and landscapes so your grass can get some sunlight and stay healthy.

title: Ornamental Tree Trimming
description: We recommend pruning your trees at least once a year to promote effective growth, and are happy to take care of the work and trimmings for you!
